channel.title: Omfg need help bad!
channel.description:
ok i download a source like phonescape or something then winrar comes up and all these things and then i dont know what to do i cant extract only "extract to specified folder" or "extract without comfirmation"
omg i cant figure this crap out!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! :eek:
please help me

item.title: Omfg need help bad!
item.dc:creator: @n00b_at_servers n00b_at_servers
item.description:
@n00b_at_servers wrote:

uhh

well i need to get the compiler to work so read the replies and post and that will tell you where i am

and when i click “open” on my complier in my folder a black screen pops and and i click “R” or “C” and it says i need JDK 5 or 6

what do i need to do!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Omfg need help bad!
item.dc:creator: @Agent766 Agent766
item.description:
@Agent766 wrote:

[quote=“monger, post:8, topic:56108”]Errr… No, you need to make your compile work. Right click compile and open in notepad. Then replace what’s in there with this:

@echo off
title YOUR SERVER NAME WILL GO HERE WHEN YOU EDIT
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_07\bin/java.exe" server
pause

If that doesn’t work try:

@echo off
title YOUR SERVER NAME WILL GO HERE WHEN YOU EDIT
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_06\bin/java.exe" server
pause

If that doesn’t work, you need to get the new version of java.[/quote]
Actually thats for Java 5.0. You need it set up for JDK 6.0

Read full topic

item.title: Omfg need help bad!
item.dc:creator: @n00b_at_servers n00b_at_servers
item.description:
@n00b_at_servers wrote:

ok im in my folder and i put the long code in my compiler then save ok

now i double click is and one of those black things pop up

the i type “r” then and it says i dont have the 5 or 6 JDK Java thing and i do how do i get it to work

ive been having problems with this forever!!!

please help out im almost done with it!!!

and i am using the server source TestScape!!![br][size=1]Posted on: February 21, 2007, 10:12:37 PM[/size][hr]help plz

and ill be back around 3pm easter time USA

peace i would like some more answers lol ;D

and please dont say it say the word or i wont know what it is thx a ton guys almost done

Errr… No, you need to make your compile work. Right click compile and open in notepad. Then replace what’s in there with this:

@echo off
title YOUR SERVER NAME WILL GO HERE WHEN YOU EDIT

If that doesn’t work, you need to get the new version of java.

item.title: Omfg need help bad!
item.dc:creator: @xCrackingx xCrackingx
item.description:
@xCrackingx wrote:

Okay, if you want to get your source running, re-download it then when it prompts you for what to do EX:Save, Open, Close, Cancel. Select SAVE then save it to your DESKTOP. Once there, just extract it using WinRAR or WinZip depending on the file type. Once that’s done, voila, your extracted source is ready to be modified\played!

Read full topic
